subject: Coaches and Managers
Hiring and Promotion
Football
lead_paragraph: St. Louis Coach Jeff Fisher announced Monday that he had hired Brian Schottenheimer to be the Rams’ offensive coordinator, a position Schottenheimer held with the Jets until two weeks ago.
snippet: St. Louis Coach Jeff Fisher announced Monday that he had hired Brian Schottenheimer to be the Rams’ offensive coordinator, a position Schottenheimer held with the Jets until two weeks ago.
